timeline.message: Change some odd naming in Potion

timeline.bodyText: The field is called showParticles, so this should be showParticles as well (it's called ShowParticles in the NBT).
timeline.author: Juuxel
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -8,28 +8,38 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1293 net/minecraft/entity/effect/StatusEffectInstance
 	FIELD field_5895 duration I
 	FIELD field_5896 type Lnet/minecraft/class_1291;
 	FIELD field_5897 LOGGER Lorg/apache/logging/log4j/Logger;
+	METHOD <init> (Lnet/minecraft/class_1291;)V
+		ARG 1 type
 	METHOD <init> (Lnet/minecraft/class_1291;I)V
 		ARG 1 type
+		ARG 2 duration
 	METHOD <init> (Lnet/minecraft/class_1291;II)V
 		ARG 1 type
 		ARG 2 duration
+		ARG 3 amplifier
 	METHOD <init> (Lnet/minecraft/class_1291;IIZZ)V
-		ARG 1 effect
+		ARG 1 type
 		ARG 2 duration
 		ARG 3 amplifier
-		ARG 5 showParticles
+		ARG 4 ambient
+		ARG 5 visible

replies.bodyText: i think this is a vararg ctor in which this param is passed into both show particle and show icon in inv screen params of another constructor.
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText: Ah, right. Should've looked in the ctor body.
replies.author: Juuxel
